body.p:
Nevada Mercer Co
Ky 2 July 1861
P Swigert Esq
Secty Arms destributing Com
Sir
I have organized a Company in this County under the late act of the Legislature and wish to apply for arms.
Will thank you on rect of this to Send me the forms & bond by Mail at this place

5
C. S. May
Home Guards
Mercer Coun^t^y
